commandOnlyConjunction(sentenceEnding)grammar

Details

Command-only conjunctions. These words and groups of words can separate commands from one another, and can't be used to separate noun phrases in a noun list. `grammar `[`commandOnlyConjunction`](../object/commandOnlyConjunction.html)`(sentenceEnding)`` :   `[`BasicProd`](../object/BasicProd.html)
